EmailTemplate.name: Web-based EMS Software_0313.Reminder 1 Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Tomorrow's Webinar Reminder: Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
TriTech Reminder: Complimentary Live Webinar Tomorrow Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}},
The complimentary live webinar "Is Web-Based EMS Software the Way of the Future?" starts tomorrow. We look forward to your questions and input for our speakers who will provide both the business and user perspectives of the web-based trend in EMS Software.
SPEAKERS: TriTech Senior Product Manager, Charlie Barry AmbCoach, Inc. President, Kimberly Walk
Tuesday, March 13, 2012 2:00PM ET l 1:00PM CT l Noon MT l 11:00AM PT
LOGIN DETAILS JOIN LINK: http://tritech.ilinc.com/join/cjfsxxm AUDIO: Listen through your computer speakers or dial in over the telephone to the toll number shown on your screen after login
Trouble logging in? Call 800.799.4510 to reach the iLinc support team for help
Questions? Cheri Lane Marketing Communications Manager cheri.lane@tritech.com
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
